sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sol_calendar(lectureno, id, regdate) VALUES (#lectureno#, #id#, now())
sqlMap.update: update sol_calendar set regdate = now() where id=#id# and lectureno = #lectureno# and calno=#calno#
sqlMap.select: select regdate from sol_calendar where id = #id#
SELECT study.id,study.lectureno,study.memo,study.memodate,calendar.regdate FROM sol_calendar calendar join sol_study study ON calendar.lectureno = study.lectureno where calendar.id=study.id

SELECT lecture.lectureno, lecture.subject,lecture.poster,category.teacherName ,calendar.regdate,calendar.id,study.memo,study.memodate FROM sol_calendar calendar join sol_study study ON calendar.lectureno = study.lectureno join sol_lecture lecture on study.lectureno = lecture.lectureno join sol_category category on lecture.categoryno = category.categoryno where calendar.id=study.id order by calendar.regdate desc
select id,regdate from sol_calendar where id=#id# group by left(regdate,10);
select memodate from sol_study where id=#id# group by left(memodate,10);

SELECT myscore.mytestno ,myscore.id ,myscore.testno , myscore.myscore , myscore.usetime ,myscore.answerno ,myscore.regdt , test.grade,test.subject,test.testtitle,myscore.mytestno FROM sol_calendar calendar join sol_myscore myscore ON calendar.id = myscore.id join sol_test test on myscore.testno = test.testno group by myscore.mytestno order by myscore.regdt desc
select bbs.bbsno,bbs.subject,bbs.content,bbs.passwd,bbs.regdt,bbs.readcnt,bbs.noticeshow FROM sol_bbs bbs where bbs.passwd=#id# order by bbs.bbsno desc limit #sno#, #numPerPage#
select qna.qnano,qna.subject,qna.passwd,qna.readcnt,qna.regdt,qna.replyok,qna.qnashow,qna.content FROM sol_qna qna where qna.id = #id# order by qna.qnano desc limit #sno#, #numPerPage#
select count(*) from sol_bbs where passwd = #id#
select count(*) from sol_qna where id = #id#
